description:
Container component for grouping related buttons with shared borders and spacing.

Groups multiple button elements together, removing border radius between them
and applying negative margins to create a visually connected button group.
Supports semantic variants via attribute selectors and customizable spacing
through design tokens. Includes accessibility support with ARIA roles and labels.

Use for action groups, toolbar-style controls, or any context where buttons
should appear as a single cohesive unit.

props.name: is
props.description: Root HTML element tag for the group container. Common values: 'div', 'nav', 'section'.

props.name: size
props.description: Padding scale for the group container; uses space tokens (e.g., 2xs, xs, s, m, l). Maps to --_ccm-form-group-padding.

props.name: variant
props.description: Presentation style variant. Use attribute selectors in CSS to style variants (e.g., [variant='attached']).

props.name: gap
props.description: Gap spacing between grouped buttons; uses space tokens (e.g., 2xs, xs, s, m, l). Maps to --_ccm-form-group-gap.

props.name: backgroundColor
props.description: Background color design token name (without -- prefix). Example: 'color-surface-subtle' or 'color-brand-500'. Maps to --_ccm-form-group-background-color.

props.name: borderRadius
props.description: Border radius token for outer corners (e.g., s, m, l, pill). Maps to --_ccm-form-group-border-radius.

props.name: ariaLabel
props.description: Accessible label for the group when no visible label exists. Recommended for toolbar or split button variants.

props.name: role
props.description: ARIA role for the container. Common values: 'group', 'toolbar'. Use 'toolbar' for action toolbars.
